list.name: Default Changelist
list.comment: Adding User profile roles form table into user edit form.

task.summary: Default task
Adapting views template using components.
Creating POST migration, model and controller.
Using Factories tu use dummy values for users and posts.
Showing posts data into the views: index and show post.
Creating routes::resource for posts and admin controller.
Created Posts CRUD using components.
Using PostPolicy into the controller and views.
Using pagination in posts index view.
Creating Roles and Permissions tables and relations with users. Using the roles and permissions to validate users authorization.
Adding username, surname and avatar field into users table and model.
Updating user register form.
Creating user updating form profile.
Creating user CRUD in admin dashboard.
Creating RoleMiddleware and UerPolicy for Admin and model owner same access.
Implementing the Alert Component in users edit.
Using nested components. Components inside a package into other components.
Adding User profile roles form table into user edit form.
Updating RouteServiceProvider for using a file for authorization routes.
Implemented roles CRUD. Attaching and detaching permissions for roles with UI.
